meanings.definition: A South Asian dish consisting of marinated pieces of meat, typically cooked in a tandoor.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious tikka dish at the Indian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The tikka was sizzling on the hot grill.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the tikka made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The tikka was a flavorful explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The chef's special tikka was the highlight of the meal.

meanings.definition: A mark or dot worn on the forehead, especially by Hindu women.
meanings.sent1: She adorned her forehead with a beautiful tikka.
meanings.sent2: The red tikka added a touch of elegance to her attire.
meanings.sent3: The tikka on her forehead matched her traditional outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her tikka shone like a tiny jewel on her forehead.
meanings.sent5: The tikka symbolized her cultural heritage with pride.
